message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper is about deep learning approaches in Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR), which falls under the intersection of computation and language. 
- cs.SD (Sound) is also a likely category as the paper deals with speech signals and their temporal and spectral structures. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another likely category as the paper proposes a novel deep and wide CNN architecture with residual connections and Connectionist Temporal Classification (CTC) loss function. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is a possible category as the paper deals with a subfield of AI, namely ASR. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possible category as the paper deals with neural network systems in ASR.
